description: This is a test file for the Flutter app's FilterScreen widget, containing widget tests that verify user interactions update the provider state correctly, such as entering filter criteria and resetting filters.

methods.name: _buildApp
methods.description: Builds the root widget of the app with providers and routes, used in tests to initialize the app environment.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Contains widget tests for filtering screen, verifying data entry, provider updates, and reset functionality.
